q: news comes as Google announced revenue for the three months to 31 December rose 26% to$ 8.44 bn, driven by gains from display and mobile advertising revenue. Eric Schmidt says of the quarterly results: Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. Net profit in the fourth quarter was$ 2.54 bn, up from$ 1.97 bn in the same period last year.

the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. "We're excited about( Keon Clark )," Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Ricky Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation. Obviously, no one knows what the outcome of redistricting will be, though there has been significant coverage of the idea that districts should reflect communities of interest, Maxfield said.
